group_1.textRight: So, how's the situation? What have you learned?

group_1.textLeft: Umm, we researched the time and@number of incidents.
We managed to narrow down the areas@we need to search...
Yes, and we think that a Witch is the cause@after all.
Although we still have to find its location...

group_1.textRight: It sounds like you're making steady progress,@even if it is at the rhythm of a snail.

group_1.textLeft: Yup.

group_1.textRight: I apologize for troubling you two...
This is a problem that we should really be taking@care of ourselves.
I shouldn't be using it as a test like this.

group_1.textLeft: But without the trouble in Takarazaki, we@wouldn't have had a chance to talk to you...
Yes, I actually consider ourselves fortunate...

group_1.textRight: Thank you.
By the way, how are things between you and Aika?@Are you getting along?

group_1.textLeft: F-for the time being...um...we're dividing our@responsibilities—
I hate that girl...
She uses her head, but not her hands...
Mgh...

group_1.textRight: It appears to be true that she merely took over@as she pleased.
If you two can't place your faith in her, I won't@join you, understand?

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:0.8][chara:102901:lipSynch_1]Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Since you've come this far, I suggest you take@the opportunity to get to know her.

group_1.textLeft: Okay...

group_1.textRight: Now, I must go continue helping the@Youth Association with preparations.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, okay!

group_1.textRight: If you can't get along with Aika, you can@discontinue the test.

group_1.textLeft: Okay...

group_1.textRight: Shigure, you don't have to tell her that you@hate Himena...

group_1.textLeft: But, I can't hide it... because I can't come to@like her...

group_1.textRight: The instructor's right...
Not being able to trust her might be our@biggest problem...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textCenter: If you're just going to stand there chit-chatting@without buying anything, please hurry on home.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wah...
Oh, um, we just happened to get a phone call@while passing by...!
Yeah...!

group_1.textLeft: Well then, I suppose you’ll just have to@buy something, won’t you?
It's hard for the little ones to come in when@big kids are standing there, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Auuu... I'm sorry...
Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: That's the same school uniform Jun wears...@Do you know her?

group_1.textRight: (That Jun is from Takarazaki, though...)
I know a girl with that name, but I think@she probably goes to a different school...
Do you have business with her?

group_1.textLeft: She's one of my long-time regulars.
She showed up once recently, but@I haven't heard a peep since.
If you happen to meet her, please@pass her a message for me.
Tell her that the two of them are always@welcome to come play here again.

group_1.textRight: Okay...

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, a message from HER...

group_1.textRight: Himena?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.narration: Shigurin, Hagurin, I need you to do me a favor!@Research some stuff for me!
My bae says he wants to check out some info.@A map of Takarazaki's sewers,@and the locations of tall buildings.
It might be in the library or something.@Why don't you go there?@Oh, it's probably online too!

group_1.textLeft: So, Shigure...

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Well, I mean, she's at least contributing@ideas...but...still...
